forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 18C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High around 65F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers in the morning becoming a steady rain in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
